Class GingerbreadSharedPreferenceSaver

      com.kth.common.preference.LegacySharedPreferenceSaver

              com.kth.common.preference.GingerbreadSharedPreferenceSaver

public class GingerbreadSharedPreferenceSaver
extends FroyoSharedPreferenceSaver

Save SharedPreferences using the asynchronous apply method available in Gingerbread, and provide the option to notify the BackupManager to initiate a backup.
